m_szDocTitle: Control parameter dependent audio signal processing - Nokia Technologies Oy
m_szDocSumamry: Control parameter dependent audio signal processing United States Patent 9185488 Abstract: Detection from sensors may be used to configure or modify the configuration of audio directional processing to improve user safety and/or communication by processing at least one control parameter dependent on at least one sensor input parameter, processing at least one audio signal dependent on the processed at least one control parameter, and outputting the processed at least one audio signal. Inventors: Karkkainen, Asta Maria (Helsinki, FI) Virolainen, Jussi (Espoo, FI) Nokia Technologies Oy (Espoo, F
